Napier assets moved to new council company - Ahuriri Investment Management https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-assets-moved-to-new-council-company-ahuriri-investment-management/J6CPFRQT7VHNXMQ3OBUZKSBLUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-assets-moved-to-new-council-company-ahuriri-investment-management/J6CPFRQT7VHNXMQ3OBUZKSBLUU/ Doug Laing'We can’t keep doing things the same way and expect a different result,' mayor says. Fri, 13 Dec 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Parklands development land will be vested in new Napier City Council investment arm Ahuriri Investment Management Ltd as part of a plan to make better returns for the city, and less demand on rates.
